sentences.sContent: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sContent_eng: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sCn: 还有一件事，记得提醒我带一些防潮布之类的东西，否则我们结束的时候会一片狼籍。

sentences.sContent: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sContent_eng: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sCn: 另外，提醒我带上防潮布，在我们结束的时候可以收集垃圾。

sentences.sContent: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sContent_eng: One more thing, remind me to get some kind of groundsheet or we'll end up getting filthy.
sentences.sCn: 还有件事，记得提醒我带一些好的防潮布，以免我们最后结束的时候都脏兮兮的。

trans.tranOther: a piece of material that water cannot pass through which people sleep on when they are camping
